BÚN BÒ HUẾ

Vietnamese bún bò huế is a soup made with beef, lemongrass, and chili peppers.

4-6 servings 30 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Large pot
  • Spoon
  • Knife
  • Cutting board

Ingredients

  • Beef
  • Lemongrass
  • Chili peppers
  • Fish sauce
  • Thai basil
  • Cilantro
  • Bean sprouts

Directions

  1. In a large pot, bring beef broth to a boil.

  2. Add lemongrass, chili peppers, and fish sauce.

  3. simmer for 30 minutes.

  4. Add beef and cook until done.

  5. Remove from heat and add Thai basil, cilantro, and bean sprouts.

  6. Serve with rice noodles.
